name: CAO - Flavours - SolFyre - Cigarrillo
additionalNotes: CAO Solfyre is a Dominican tobacco blend with a Cameroon wrapper and infused spicy notes of cinnamon, with the smoky essence of whisky. The cigar was added to the popular CAO Flavours line in 2015. The flavor of whiskey is prominent and spiced up with cinnamon, in a combination that the manufacturer calls spicy-sweet.
